Okey, I'm having some trouble. I've got it to work except that when I start the game it's just black.. No image.. Does anyone know what I've done wrong?

1. Mount image (I used Daemon tools)
2. In autorun box, click open files
3. Open folder called "Crack"
4. Click serial.exe
5. Choose Harry potter and the goblet of fire from drop down menu
6. Generate to get installation key
7. Click Autorun.exe
8. Follow instructions

unfortunately, you cannot receive "rewards" from the ea games thing cause the key has been used before. at least you'll get to play the game!

Okay then I was stuck to a black window as well.

Open crack folder
Copy gof_f.exe into C:Program FilesElectronic ArtsHarry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Worked for me!
